metadata.title: CVE-2024-0811 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Extensions API in Google Chrome prior to121.0.6167.85 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to leak cross-origin data via a crafted ChromeExtension. (Chromium security severity: Low)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
